<title level="1" pfs="">[Skin Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2461)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A typical skin beetle is 1-1/2 feet long and weighs 10 pounds—about the size of a house cat. Its oval-shaped body is covered in dull-colored scales, and short, club-like antennae stem from shallow grooves in its head.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Skin Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2461)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Surgical Mandibles** A skin beetle can use its mandibles as [healer's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 55

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 15 feet, fly 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spit +13 ([range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 acid plus anesthetic saliva

**Anesthetic Saliva**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A creature exposed to a skin beetle's saliva must succeed on a DC 19 Fortitude save or become [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 round.

**Harvest Flesh** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The skin beetle makes a mandibles Strike against an [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) or [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). If the Strike deals damage, the beetle tears off a large portion of flesh, dealing an additional 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>
